customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera about 3 years ago and have about 4000 clicks on it. I loved the camera but it recently developed the infamous aperture control block failure. I also have a K-S1 with this problem. An internet search will tell you all about it. As far as I know, Pentax has not offered any recall or extended warranty to fix the issue, which first appeared on the K-30 and K-50 models. I'm very disappointed that Pentax can let this problem linger through so many models. It makes me question the reliability and quality of their cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Tatanta

customer_reviews.title: A great budget camera for both beginner and intermediate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera back in July, and have taken close to 10,000 photos with it. It was purchased to replace my Pentax K-x that had quit working after 10 years of use. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for an entry to intermediate level camera that's on a budget. I've included a few photos I've taken with 3 different lenses. The lenses used were a DA L 18-55 for the Landscapes, a DA L 55-300 for the bird shots, and the night time shots a DA 50.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ++ A good selection of features offering up some very nice image quality ++
customer_reviews.text: For the first-timer or family photographer, the Pentax K-S2 is a nice dSLR, but it drops the ball for video and you should pass on the new 18-50mm kit lens when compared to something like this Nikon here:  THE GOOD: + The Pentax K-S2 offers excellent photo quality, a solid weather-sealed build, a big viewfinder and a broad feature set. THE BAD: - Its video quality is middling to poor. An all-round good Pentax camera offering good quality you would expect but should only be purchased for the image quality aspect as the video shooting leaves some to be desired. If video will be important then maybe try something like this Canon here:

product_meta.title: Pentax K-S2 20MP Wi-Fi Enabled Weatherized SLR Body Only (Black)
product_meta.description: Excite your inner artist with the PENTAX K-S2. Building on the legacy of great SLRs, Ricoh Imaging brings you our first DSLR with Wi-Fi connectivity allowing you to seamlessly share your images to social media as well as browsing images from remote tablet or PC. Capturing sharp images has never been easier with its 20 megapixel, AA Filter-less CMOS sensor with Prime MII. Completing your kit is an all-new retractable standard zoom. This ultra thin, weather resistant lens matches perfectly with the compact body of the K-S2, offering high-level ease of carrying. This model features a "selfie" button making it easy to capture the photographer in the shot as well. Shoot compelling images and share them instantaneously as the PENTAX K-S2 becomes your go-to photography companion.
